short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect, annotate and collaborate anywhere you damn well please.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skate allows you to create private notes and team discussions that stick with you as you bounce between documents, mockups, spreadsheets, kanban boards, project issues, file folders, forums, wikis or any other web resource. Don't waste time scheduling yet another meeting to review links, spawning yet another channel or trying to remember who said what to whom where. With Skate, where you are is where you plan, and staying in context is easier than ever.
